summary: Ever wondered why the dragonborn has the ability to shout, but does not resemble a dragon at all? With this mod he will get abilities of the Dragons step by step.
descriptionHtml:
The mod requires the flying spell mod!
This mod is only in it's very early stages. Many changes are still to be made.

It now features:
4 new dragons that will spawn after one another
4 abilities with notes
A NPC in the Sleeping Giant Inn with a (new) book about the dragonborn

To do list:
Create new meshes to support the dragonborn's change
Create new animations for flight
make the changes level- or time-dependant instead of defeating-a-dragon-dependant
Create a questline
And some more thinks I come up with (weapons, books, spells, features etc.)





Spoiler:


The dragons will spawn in these locations:
1. Near the watch-tower near Falkreath
2. To the west of Solitude
3. Mara's Eye Pond
4. To the north of Dawnstar
author: ErianDragonborn
